title: How to Have a Scrapbook

steps.headline: Go to your local art supply store and buy a scrapbook that only has clear flaps that are all empty.
steps.description: You can probably find lots of different designs on the front of the scrapbook, also you can probably find a scrapbook that has a clear front that has a flap on itself. You can put pictures on the scrapbook cover!

steps.headline: Collect some pictures that you want to put in the scrapbook.
steps.description: You can choose one theme for the whole scrapbook or you can choose a different subject for each page. But either way choose some fun, colorful pictures!

steps.headline: Now you can start making your list!
steps.description: What list you ask well the list that says what kind of pages and themes you want in your scrapbook. after you make this list you may want to go back to your local art supply store and pick out some fun craft book stickers that match your themes you have on your list.

steps.headline: While you're at your art supply store pick up some colorful pages that you can slide into the flaps.
steps.description: Be sure to look at your list when choosing because you can also find pages that will match the themes you want in your book.

steps.headline: If you're using tape to keep your pictures in place that's fine, but there are also lots of other options, such as... at your art supply store in the scrapbook section they may have DOUBLE sided tape, glue dots, the peel-off-stickies, and many, many more.
steps.description: Choose something that suits you but be sure not to pick something that's thick because that will backfire when your pictures are in the book.

steps.headline: Now place the pages that you have purchased to match your theme in the flap.
After you have everything you want to make a scrapbook you we can start the placing of the pictures.
steps.description: Be sure to place the pictures in a fun way, like slanted.

steps.headline: After you have placed the pictures in the flap put your stickers on the page of the scrapbook.
steps.description: Don't place the stickers on top of the pictures unless only on the edge.

steps.headline: Now that you have finished all of your pages you can share your memories with everyone!
steps.description: Just be sure to have fun and go crazy-artistic!

text: Go to your local art supply store and buy a scrapbook that only has clear flaps that are all empty. You can probably find lots of different designs on the front of the scrapbook, also you can probably find a scrapbook that has a clear front that has a flap on itself. You can put pictures on the scrapbook cover! Collect some pictures that you want to put in the scrapbook. You can choose one theme for the whole scrapbook or you can choose a different subject for each page. But either way choose some fun, colorful pictures! Now you can start making your list! What list you ask well the list that says what kind of pages and themes you want in your scrapbook. after you make this list you may want to go back to your local art supply store and pick out some fun craft book stickers that match your themes you have on your list. While you're at your art supply store pick up some colorful pages that you can slide into the flaps. Be sure to look at your list when choosing because you can also find pages that will match the themes you want in your book. If you're using tape to keep your pictures in place that's fine, but there are also lots of other options, such as... at your art supply store in the scrapbook section they may have DOUBLE sided tape, glue dots, the peel-off-stickies, and many, many more. Choose something that suits you but be sure not to pick something that's thick because that will backfire when your pictures are in the book. Now place the pages that you have purchased to match your theme in the flap.  After you have everything you want to make a scrapbook you we can start the placing of the pictures. Be sure to place the pictures in a fun way, like slanted. After you have placed the pictures in the flap put your stickers on the page of the scrapbook. Don't place the stickers on top of the pictures unless only on the edge. Now that you have finished all of your pages you can share your memories with everyone! Just be sure to have fun and go crazy-artistic!
